name: Docker
description: Platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers.

name: Kubernetes
description: Open-source system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.

name: Terraform
description: Infrastructure as Code software tool that provides a consistent CLI workflow to manage hundreds of cloud services.

name: Prometheus
description: Open-source systems monitoring and alerting toolkit originally built at SoundCloud.

name: Grafana
description: Open source analytics and interactive visualization web application.

name: Jenkins
description: Open source automation server which enables developers around the world to reliably build, test, and deploy their software.

name: GitLab
description: The One DevOps Platform for software innovation.

name: Elasticsearch
description: Distributed, RESTful search and analytics engine capable of addressing a growing number of use cases.

name: Apache Kafka
description: Open-source distributed event streaming platform used by thousands of companies for high-performance data pipelines.

name: Windsurf
description: AI coding assistant geïntegreerd in Jetbrains PhpStorm, geadopteerd door developers voor ondersteuning bij programmeren.

name: Azure AI Foundry
description: AI infrastructuur-oplossing van Microsoft Azure, ingezet na interne evaluatie en trial.

name: Windows Copilot
description: AI-assistent geïntegreerd in Windows voor productiviteitsverbetering.

name: Salesforce AI
description: AI-functionaliteit binnen Salesforce voor CRM-processen.

name: Keeper
description: Password manager voor veilig beheer van wachtwoorden.

name: Visual Studio Copilot
description: AI-coding assistant geïntegreerd in Visual Studio.

name: VS Code Agentforce
description: AI-agent voor Visual Studio Code.

name: LastPass
description: Password manager voor veilig beheer van wachtwoorden.

name: Elmah.io
description: Logging- en monitoringtool, voorheen gebruikt bij Umbraco.

name: Azure DevOps
description: Azure DevOps board, gebruikt voor werken met storypoints in plaats van uren.

name: Optimizely Opal
description: AI-driven assistant integrated across the Optimizely One digital experience platform.

name: Sanity.io
description: The Composable Content Cloud. A headless CMS that treats content as data.

name: Laravel
description: The PHP Framework for Web Artisans.

name: Preact
description: Fast 3kB alternative to React with the same modern API.

name: GitHub Copilot
description: AI pair programmer that helps you write code faster.

name: ChatGPT
description: AI-powered conversational agent by OpenAI.

name: Claude Code
description: Agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, developed by Anthropic.

name: Ansible
description: Open-source software provisioning, configuration management, and application-deployment tool.

name: Palo Alto Cortex XDR
description: Extended Detection and Response (XDR) platform that unifies security data and applies analytics to stop modern attacks.

name: Red Hat Advanced Cluster Management
description: Provides end-to-end visibility and control to manage your Kubernetes clusters across hybrid and multicloud environments.

name: Red Hat Advanced Cluster Security
description: Kubernetes-native security platform for container and application security across the entire development lifecycle and runtime.

name: Dynatrace
description: Software intelligence platform that uses AI and automation to monitor, optimize, and secure applications and infrastructure.

name: Azure Sentinel
description: A scalable, cloud-native Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) and Security Orchestration, Automation, and Response (SOAR) solution.

name: Vectra (NDR)
description: Network Detection and Response (NDR) platform that uses AI to detect and hunt for hidden threats across the cloud, data center, and enterprise.

name: Darktrace (NDR)
description: Cyber AI company that uses self-learning AI to detect and respond to in-progress cyber-attacks across the digital environment.

name: Netskope (ZTNA)
description: A security cloud that provides Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA), CASB, and other SASE components to secure data and control access.

name: Ansible Automation Platform
description: An enterprise-grade platform for automation, providing centralized control, security, and management for Ansible deployments.

name: N8N
description: Open-source workflow automation tool that helps to connect apps and services with a focus on ease of use and flexibility.

name: CoPilot Studio/Power Automate
description: Power Automate is a service that helps you create automated workflows, and CoPilot Studio is a platform for creating AI assistants and copilots.

name: EKS
description: Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (EKS) is a managed Kubernetes service on AWS.

name: AKS
description: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) is a managed Kubernetes service on Microsoft Azure.

name: Elastic SIEM
description: Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) solution built on the Elastic Stack (Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats, and Logstash).

name: Elastic EDR
description: Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) capabilities integrated into the Elastic Security platform for endpoint prevention and response.

name: PKI (EJBCA)
description: Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) solution, often referencing EJBCA as a flexible, high-performance CA software package.

name: Azure Local
description: Refers to local, on-premise infrastructure components or services that integrate with Azure, like Azure Stack or local development environments.

name: Puppet
description: Software for automating configuration, deployment, and management across infrastructure.

name: Developer Portal (Red Hat)
description: A centralized, self-service platform provided by Red Hat to help developers discover, access, and utilize APIs and development resources.

name: Zabbix
description: Open-source enterprise-class monitoring solution for networks and applications, providing real-time metrics, problem detection, and alerts.

name: Uniserver
description: Nederlandse cloudprovider gespecialiseerd in IaaS en managed cloud-oplossingen, vaak gericht op de channel en MKB.

name: NextCloud
description: Open-source, zelf-hostable suite voor bestandssynchronisatie, delen, en communicatie, als alternatief voor publieke clouddiensten.

name: Cursor
description: Een AI-gedreven code-editor die gebaseerd is op VS Code, ontworpen om sneller te coderen en debuggen met behulp van AI-assistentie.

name: Scaleway
description: Een Europese cloud-infrastructuurprovider die een breed scala aan diensten biedt, waaronder compute, storage en bare metal.

name: OVHcloud
description: Een Franse wereldwijde cloudprovider die publieke en private cloudoplossingen, hosting en dedicated servers aanbiedt, met een focus op Europese data-soevereiniteit.

name: StackIT
description: De cloudprovider van de Schwarz Group (o.a. Lidl), gericht op veilige en soevereine cloudoplossingen, voornamelijk in Europa.

name: WebAssembly (WASM)
description: Een binaire instructie-formaat voor een stack-based virtuele machine. Ontworpen als een draagbare compilatie-target voor talen op het web en daarbuiten.
